subject: Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: The Knicks (9-26) have not won at home since beating the Cleveland Cavaliers on Dec. 19. And they do not seem close to unearthing a recipe for a victory at the Garden.
snippet: The Knicks (9-26) have not won at home since beating the Cleveland Cavaliers on Dec. 19. And they do not seem close to unearthing a recipe for a victory at the Garden.
